carl.abr.gui
Class Main_activity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      carl.abr.gui.Main_activity

public class Main_activity
extends Activity

Main activity (GUI) of the ABR_client app. This activity is used to save IP addresses and port numbers to connect to a TCP server. It also creates a thread (the_main_thread) that will run the main loop of the app (connect to the server, get data from sensors camera ioio, process data, send data ,set motor command ioio)

See Also:
Main_thread

enable_buttons

private void enable_buttons(boolean b)
Enables or disables the delete IP, delete Port and Connect buttons.

Parameters:
b - : true to enable the buttons, false to disable the buttons

start_main_thread

public void start_main_thread()
Creates and starts the main thread (the_main_thread). Starting the thread will call its run() function.
